projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: Developed a dynamic weather application using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Implemented API integration to fetch real-time weather data. Designed a user-friendly interface with responsive design for optimal performance on various devices.

projects.name: To-Do List App
projects.description: Developed a dynamic to-do list application using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Designed and implemented a user-friendly interface for task management, including adding, editing, and deleting tasks. Utilized JavaScript for DOM manipulation to create an interactive and responsive user experience.

projects.name: Blogging Website
projects.description: Developed a full-stack blogging website using the MERN (MySQL, Express.js, React, Node.js) stack. Implemented CRUD operations for blog posts, including creating, reading, updating, and deleting posts. Utilized MySQL for efficient data storage and retrieval.

experiences.description: Designed, coded, and maintained web applications using modern technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, MySQL. Collaborated with team members using Git for version control and participated in regular code reviews to ensure code quality and best practices. Identified and resolved bugs and performance issues, improving application efficiency and user experience.
